declarations.description: Links to Elements that can have a active-state (dialog, details, popover, etc.) can be activated by simply linking to its id. This is done by adding the custom attribute u2-navigable to the element.
declarations.name: u2-navigable

attributes.name: u2-navigable
attributes.description: By adding the custom attribute u2-navigable to an element, the element becomes navigatable. Opens by hash-link even on loading the page, changes the url by closing the element.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: An id is required to navigate to the element.
